version_description:
- Implemented consistency for the back button
- Improved the red dot notifications in certain menus
- Fixed several bugs including: skills' displayed level, currencies' amounts decimals, Cleopatra's skills visual effects etc.

- Weâ€™ve tweaked some of the Heroes and Units animations and behaviour

- Various UI improvements
- Other bug fixes and improvements
